descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/ssPRCSA.jpg[/img]
Sorry,I can not speak English
This text is a machine translation

[b][color=#6aa84f][size=4][About][/size][/color][/b]
This MOD will add the [soletta] of stand-alone Follower
She likes Two-handed and Heavy Armor
She has to stay The Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun
(Braidwood inn Kynesgrove, also possible in the options file)
She is Essential, And you can get married
Body Type is UNPB - TBBP or CBBE

[color=#6aa84f][size=4][Recommended MODs][/size][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]Face Light[/url] by tktk
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35303/?]Female Facial Animation[/url] by nao4288
Follower Overhaul Mod
(My environment is [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12933/?]EFF[/url] and the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33002/?]FLP[/url]. However , I think other MODS also okay)

[size=4]
[color=#6aa84f][Change Log][/color][/size]
V1.2
・Add Blode Hair Option

V1.1
・Add Body Type　CBBE
・Change the display of the name from soletta to Soletta
・Add option esp, for changing the residence from The Drunken Huntsman to Braidwood inn
